BIO

Hi, I'm Mike Hatch. A full-stack web developer based in La La Land, USA. My main interest lies in JavaScript and its related technologies. Web development for me is like navigating through a maze. A solution is found once all bindings are in tact. When I'm not busy coding you can find me eating gobs of peanut butter.
